Package com.what2see.controller.tour

Class TourController

java.lang.Object
com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/tour") public class TourController extends Object
Controller for tour endpoints

  • Method Details

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{tourId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TourResponseDTO> getById(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long userId)
      Get a specific tour by its ID
      Parameters:
      tourId - wanted tour
      userId - requesting user
      Returns:
      wanted tour DTO
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED if user is not authorized to see the wanted tour

    • search

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TourResponseDTO>> search(@Valid @Valid TourSearchDTO s, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long userId)
      Get all tours that match all specified criteria.
      For tags, it is sufficient that at least one is present.
      For maximum duration, it is sufficient that it is lower or equal.
      Parameters:
      s - DTO representing criteria (city and/or tags and/or theme and/or maximum duration) to search with
      userId - requesting user
      Returns:
      list of tours that match all specified criteria

    • getAvailableActions

      @GetMapping("/{tourId}/availableActions") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TourActionsResponseDTO> getAvailableActions(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long userId)
      Get the interactions that the requesting user is able to perform on the specified tour.
      Parameters:
      tourId - tour to check
      userId - requesting user
      Returns:
      list of available actions as key (actionName) / value (boolean) DTO
      See Also:
      • TourActionsResponseDTO

    • getSharedTourists

      @GetMapping("/{tourId}/shared") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserResponseDTO>> getSharedTourists(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long guideId)
      Get the list of users that have been shared the specified tour with and therefore are able to see it even if private.
      It is intended to only be used by the tour author guide.
      Parameters:
      tourId - tour to check
      guideId - requesting guide (tour's author)
      Returns:
      list of users that have been shared the specified tour with
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED if user is not tour's author

    • getSharedWithMe

      @GetMapping("/shared") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TourResponseDTO>> getSharedWithMe(@RequestHeader("Authentication") Long touristId)
      Get the list of tours that have been shared with the requesting user and therefore is able to see even if private.
      Parameters:
      touristId - requesting tourist
      Returns:
      list of tours that have been shared with the requesting user

    • getReported

      @GetMapping("/reported") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TourResponseDTO>> getReported(@RequestHeader("Authentication") Long administratorId)
      Get the list of tours that have at have been reported at least once
      Parameters:
      administratorId - requesting administrator
      Returns:
      list of tours that have at have been reported at least once

    • getCreatedByMe

      @GetMapping("/created") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TourResponseDTO>> getCreatedByMe(@RequestHeader("Authentication") Long guideId)
      Get the list of tours that have been created by the requesting guide
      Parameters:
      guideId - requesting guide
      Returns:
      list of tours that have been created by the requesting guide

    • getReportsById

      @GetMapping("/{tourId}/report") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ReportResponseDTO>> getReportsById(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long administratorId)
      Get the list of reports created by tourists onto the specified tour
      Parameters:
      tourId - tour to check
      administratorId - requesting administrator
      Returns:
      list of reports created by tourists onto the specified tour

    • getCompletedByMe

      @GetMapping("/completed") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TourResponseDTO>> getCompletedByMe(@RequestHeader("Authentication") Long touristId)
      Get the list of tours that have been completed by the requesting tourist
      Parameters:
      touristId - requesting tourist
      Returns:
      list of tours that have been completed by the requesting tourist

    • editById

      @PatchMapping("/{tourId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TourResponseDTO> editById(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid TourCreateDTO editedTour, @PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long guideId)
      Edit the specified tour with the provided data.
      It is intended to only be used by the tour author guide.
      Parameters:
      editedTour - DTO representing the data to update the tour with. It is essentially the same object that is returned by create(com.what2see.dto.tour.TourCreateDTO, java.lang.Long) method, with modifications to the fields that are expected to be changed.
      tourId - tour to edit
      guideId - requesting guide (must be the tour's author)
      Returns:
      the updated tour
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED if user is not tour's author

    • deleteById

      @DeleteMapping("/{tourId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteById(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long userId)
      Delete the specified tour.
      It is intended to only be used by the tour author guide or by an administrator.
      Parameters:
      tourId - tour to delete
      userId - requesting guide (must be the tour's author or an administrator)
      Returns:
      HttpStatus.OK (empty response body) if the tour has been deleted successfully
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED if user is not tour's author or an administrator

    • create

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TourResponseDTO> create(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid TourCreateDTO t, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long guideId)
      Create a new tour with the provided data.
      The title must be unique and tags will be created on the fly if not already existing.
      Parameters:
      t - DTO representing the data to create the tour with
      guideId - requesting guide
      Returns:
      the created tour
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST if the tour name is already taken

    • createReview

      @PostMapping("/{tourId}/review") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReviewResponseDTO> createReview(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid ReviewCreateDTO r, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long touristId)
      Leave a new review on the specified tour.
      It is intended to only be used by a tourist that has actually marked the tour as completed and only once per tour.
      Parameters:
      tourId - tour to review
      r - DTO representing the data to create the review with
      touristId - requesting tourist
      Returns:
      the created review
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST if the tour was not marked as completed or if was already reviewed by the requesting tourist

    • createReport

      @PostMapping("/{tourId}/report") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReportResponseDTO> createReport(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid ReportCreateDTO r, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long touristId)
      Leave a new report on the specified tour.
      It is intended to only be used by a tourist once per tour.
      Parameters:
      tourId - tour to report
      r - DTO representing the data to create the report with
      touristId - requesting tourist
      Returns:
      the created report
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST if the tour was already reported by the requesting tourist

    • markAsCompletedByMe

      @PostMapping("/{tourId}/completed") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> markAsCompletedByMe(@PathVariable Long tourId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long touristId)
      Mark the specified tour as completed by the requesting tourist.
      It is intended to only be used by a tourist once per tour.
      Parameters:
      tourId - tour to mark as completed
      touristId - requesting tourist
      Returns:
      HttpStatus.OK (empty response body) if the tour has been marked as completed successfully
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST if the tour was already marked as completed by the requesting tourist
